description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Brave barrages of colored 'Bloops' and treacherous flying pebbles to defeat your friends in this exciting action-puzzle game.  Match Bloops on the opposing 'rock' and conquer your opponent's den. Experience match three mechanics combined with classic combat gameplay in a head to head experience that’s familiar - yet unlike anything you’ve played before.  Find out more at: http://bloopgame.com/
